### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE player_performance (
	p_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	player_name VARCHAR(50),
	goals_scored INT,
	assists INT,
	fouls INT
);


CREATE TABLE team_performance (
	team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	team_name VARCHAR(50),
	goals_scored INT,
	assists INT,
	fouls INT
);


CREATE TABLE match_results (
	match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	match_date DATE,
	team_id INT,
	opponent_id INT,
	goals_scored INT,
	goals_conceded INT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE player_performance SET goals_scored = goals_scored + 1 WHERE p_id = 1;

CREATE TABLE player_performance_metrics (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR(50),
  goals_scored INT,
  assists INT,
  fouls INT
);

CREATE TABLE match_details (
  match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  match_date DATE,
  stadium_name VARCHAR(100),
  home_team VARCHAR(50),
  away_team VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE team_stats (
  team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(50),
  goals_conceded INT,
  yellow_cards INT,
  red_cards INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
  player_id INT,
  team_id INT,
  matches_played INT,
  goals_scored INT,
  assists INT,
  fouls_committed INT
);

CREATE TABLE match_stats (
  match_id INT,
  team_id INT,
  goals_scored INT,
  goals_conceded INT,
  yellow_cards INT,
  red_cards INT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE player_performance_metrics SET goals_scored = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
